mapper.insert: insert into analysis_project_words_1 (id, word, nature, frequency, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into analysis_project_words_1
id,
word,
nature,
frequency,
create_time,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update analysis_project_words_1
word = #{word,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nature = #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
frequency = #{frequency,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into analysis_project_words_${analysisProjectId}_frequency (word, nature,frequency) SELECT word,nature,SUM(frequency) FROM analysis_project_words_${analysisProjectId} GROUP BY word having word is not null and word !='' ORDER BY SUM(frequency) desc
mapper.update: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS analysis_project_words_${analysisProjectId}; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS analysis_project_words_${analysisProjectId}_frequency;
mapper.select:
select
from analysis_project_words_${analysisProjectId}_frequency where `nature` in (${natures}) and `id` limit ${pageStart},${pageSize};
